sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā líkāi le Zhōngguó.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He left China.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Fángjiān lǐtou yǒu rén ma?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Y a-t-il quelqu'un à l'intérieur de la chambre ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Is there anyone inside the room?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì gěi nǐ de lǐwù.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a gift for you.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng liúxià nǐ de liánxì fāngshì.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please leave your contact information.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我的理想是当一名作家。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ de lǐxiǎng shì dāng yī míng zuòjiā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mon rêve est de devenir écrivain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My dream is to become a writer.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīntiān qìwēn língxià wǔ dù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La température est de moins cinq degrés aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The temperature is minus five degrees today.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Héshuǐ zài liúdòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The river water is flowing.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ duì zhè cì lǚxíng hěn mǎnyì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis très satisfait de ce voyage.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I'm very satisfied with this trip.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nà shíhou wǒ háishì gè xuéshēng.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: At that time, I was still a student.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nàme, wǒmen míngtiān jiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Then, see you tomorrow.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shǒu gē zhēn nántīng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette chanson est vraiment désagréable à écouter.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This song sounds really bad.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ shì jǐ niánjí de xuéshēng?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What grade are you in?

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 听到这个消息，我很难过。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tīngdào zhège xiāoxi, wǒ hěn nánguò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: En entendant cette nouvelle, je suis très triste.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Hearing this news, I'm very sad.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī dào nántí.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a difficult problem.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng ràng yīxià, wǒ yào guòqù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez vous pousser, je dois passer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please make way, I need to pass.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Míngtiān tiānqì qíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Tomorrow will be sunny.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qítā rén dōu qù le.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Everyone else has gone.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè běn shū yǒu yīqiān yè.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This book has one thousand pages.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 其中有三个是我的朋友。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qízhōng yǒu sān gè shì wǒ de péngyou.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Parmi eux, trois sont mes amis.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Among them, three are my friends.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qiūtiān shùyè huì biàn huáng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: En automne, les feuilles deviennent jaunes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: In autumn, the leaves turn yellow.
